name: igblast
publications: IgBLAST: an immunoglobulin variable domain sequence analysis tool. Ye J1, Ma N, Madden TL, Ostell JM. Nucleic Acids Res. 2013 Jul;41(Web Server issue):W34-40.
description: IgBLAST was developed at NCBI to facilitate analysis of immunoglobulin variable domain sequences (IgBLAST has recently been extended to perform analysis for T cell receptor (TR) sequences)
